list.name: City
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_uptime" WITH KEY = "city"

list.name: Group
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_uptime" WITH KEY = "group" WHERE city =~ /^$City$/
list.tagValuesQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_uptime" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE "group" = '$tag'

list.name: Device
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_uptime" WITH KEY = "title" WHERE city =~ /^$City$/ AND "group" =~ /^$Group$/
list.tagValuesQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_uptime" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE "group" = '$tag'
list.tagsQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_uptime" WITH KEY = "group"

list.name: Interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_if_traffic_rx" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE "title" =~ /^$Device$/

list.label: Subinterface
list.name: sub
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_if_traffic_rx" WITH KEY = "subinstance" WHERE "title" =~ /^$Device$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$Interface$/

list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_uptime" WITH KEY = "hostname" WHERE "title" =~ /^$Device$/

list.name: Logs
list.query: host:$host AND NOT action:(INVALID_RP_JOIN OR ACL_DENY OR SUPPRESS_LOG OR SNMP_FAIL) AND NOT (action:CFGLOG_LOGGEDCMD AND message:"enable failed")
